name: add_emojiboard
shortDesc: Create a new emojiboard
detailedDesc:
Adds an emojiboard for Stewbot to run. If the emoji you choose is reacted enough times on a message (configurable threshold), then it will be posted to a highlights reel channel of your choosing.

				You can choose if Stewbot should display a random message and an embed with the message, just an embed with the message, or use webhooks to appear as if the user who originally made the post in question posted it there themselves.

name: admin_message
shortDesc: Post anonymously in the server's name
detailedDesc: Moderators can use this command to make a post in the server's name. If you specify a user, Stewbot will DM the selected user with the message of choice. If no user is selected, the bot will use webhooks to post your message in the server's name in the same channel this command is used in.

name: anti_hack
shortDesc: Defend server from hacked accounts.
detailedDesc: This module watches for spam messages that look like they are from hacked accounts, and times out the user until they complete a captcha verification

name: auto-join-message
shortDesc: Set up a message to be sent automatically when a user joins
detailedDesc: Configures a template message Stewbot will post to a designated channel or the user's DMs in the server's name every time a user joins

name: auto-join-roles
shortDesc: Automatically add roles to a user when they join the server
detailedDesc: Configures a set of roles added to every user whenever they join the server. If you have sticky roles enabled, and the user has been in the server before, sticky roles will override any auto join roles.

name: auto-leave-message
shortDesc: Set up a message to be sent automatically when a user leaves
detailedDesc: Configures a template message Stewbot will post to a designated channel in the server's name every time a user leaves

name: auto_roles
shortDesc: Setup a message with auto roles
detailedDesc: In the channel this command is used in, Stewbot will post a configurable message with buttons to add and remove the selected roles from themselves. Start by using the command with the message, and then Stewbot will prompt for the roles.

name: badware_scanner
shortDesc: A module that scans links for malicious content.
detailedDesc: This is a developing command using public lists and other methods to identify malicious links.

name: ban
shortDesc: Ban a user, temporarily if desired
detailedDesc: This command will ban a user. If you specify an amount of days or hours, this ban will automatically revert after that many days and hours. If you do not specify either of those, this ban will be permanent until manually removed.

name: bible
shortDesc: Look up one or more verses in the King James Bible
detailedDesc:
Search for up to five verses in the King James Bible. If you were to look up verses four through eight in the thirteenth chapter of the book of 1 Corinthians, you would enter "1 Corinthians 13:4-8".

                Other versions may come later.

name: block_module
shortDesc: Block bot commands and features from being used in this server
detailedDesc: Enter a command that you want to disable users from ever using in this server. If you set unblock to true, this command will unblock a command so that users may use it again.
block_module_message: I will be unable to unblock this command if you block it, therefore I cannot block this command.

name: chat
shortDesc: Ask Stewbot's AI something
detailedDesc: Have a fun chat with Stewbot's self-hosted AI

name: clone_emoji
shortDesc: Upload an emoji from another server to use in this one
detailedDesc: This command will copy an emoji from another server here. Use Prime Emoji in another server to start the process, and then use clone from primed emoji to bring it here. Use clone from emoji ID to find the emoji using the emoji ID, clone from a Nitro emoji to enter the emoji using Nitro directly, etc.

name: counting config
shortDesc: Configure counting for this server
detailedDesc: Configure the counting game here. To play, simply enter the next number in the sequence without messing up. You can configure that users need to wait a specific number of turns. The goal is to become the highest on the leaderboard.

name: counting set_number
shortDesc: Set the next number to count at
detailedDesc: Sets the next number for you to count at. If the number you choose is greater than one, this will disqualify the server from the leaderboard until a reset.

name: daily-config
shortDesc: Configure daily postings
detailedDesc: Configure daily devotions, a daily verse of the day, and/or a daily meme to be posted to any channel you'd like every day at noon UTC.

name: define
shortDesc: Get the definition for a word
detailedDesc: Look up the specified word in the dictionary and view the definitions.

name: delete
shortDesc: Delete any number of messages
detailedDesc: Delete the specified number of messages in bulk. Must be less than a hundred for each time this command is used.

name: delete_message
shortDesc: Delete the message, useful for Stewbot DMs
detailedDesc: Deletes the specified message from the context menu. This command exists primarily to remove DMs with Stewbot.

name: donate
shortDesc: Help support the bot's development
detailedDesc:
Stewbot is a passion project, born out of our desire for the ultimate Discord bot. We never charge for any usage of the bot. We never have advertisements. We never store, or sell your info. We make the source code that the bot runs on public and open source. We provide free features that other bots charge for.

                

                If this is something that speaks to you, that you want to support and to help fund, you can donate here.

name: edit_emojiboard
shortDesc: Configure an emojiboard for this server
detailedDesc: Change settings for a previously added emojiboard in this server

name: embed_message
shortDesc: Embed a message link from another channel or server
detailedDesc: This command allows you to enter a message link from any channel or server you are in and have Stewbot to display it. If Stewbot does not share the server with you, you can still embed it by installing Stewbot to use everywhere (click his PFP and then "Add App" to do so) and then using the "prime_embed" context menu command (right click on desktop, hold down on mobile, then press Apps) on the message you'd like to embed, and then using this command and entering "PRIMED".

name: filter config
shortDesc: Manage the filter for this server
detailedDesc: Configure an automatic filter for this server, Stewbot allows you to censor messages without deleting them all the way.

name: filter add
shortDesc: Add a word to the filter
detailedDesc: Add the specified word to the filter for Stewbot to delete or censor on sight

name: filter remove
shortDesc: Remove a word from the filter
detailedDesc: Remove the specified from the filter and allow posts to contain that word once more

name: filter import
shortDesc: Import a CSV wordlist
detailedDesc: Import a .csv file containing a list of words seperated by commas to block. You can generate one from another server's filter using the  command.

name: fun dne
shortDesc: Posts a picture of a person who never existed using AI
detailedDesc: Uses https://thispersondoesnotexist.com/ to display a picture of a completely fake human face.

name: fun rac
shortDesc: Play a game of Rows & Columns
detailedDesc:
**Rows & Columns**

					

					In this game your goal is to make as many of the longest rows as possible. Diagonal rows do not count. 3 in a row is 1 point, 4 in a row is 2 points, 5 in a row is 3 points, and so on. The game ends when all spots are filled.

					

					To join the game, press the Join Game button.

					To make a move, press the Make a Move button and input the grid location of the spot you want to move (So if you wanted to move in the third spot from the left on the top row, you would type `AC`).

					

					This is not a turn-based game - you may move once every 15 minutes, or once _anybody else_ has moved. This is a game of skill, strategy, and speed.

name: fun wyr
shortDesc: Posts a Would-You-Rather question
detailedDesc: Posts a would you rather question. Disclaimer: This command uses a third party API, and has no quality guarantee.

name: fun joke
shortDesc: Posts a joke
detailedDesc: Posts a joke. Disclaimer: This command uses a third party API, and has no quality guarantee.

name: fun meme
shortDesc: Posts a meme
detailedDesc: Posts one of the memes Stewbot's staff have approved for the bot to display. You can use the /submit_meme context menu command (holding down the message on mobile, right clicking on desktop, and then pressing Apps) to submit a meme for the Stewbot staff to review.

name: general_config
shortDesc: Configure general behaviours for the bot
detailedDesc: Configure automatic actions the bot will take server wide, including whether Stewbot will automatically post embeds when it sees a message link, or if you want to disable Stewbot's automatic hacked/spam account protection.

name: groupmute_config
shortDesc: Configure the ability for server members to vote to mute someone
detailedDesc: Configure an emoji that users can react to a message, and once it reaches a configured threshold the user will be timeouted for the configured amount of time.

name: hat_pull
shortDesc: Draw (a) name(s) from a hat, like a raffle or giveaway
detailedDesc: Have Stewbot help manage a raffle or giveaway like event, including automatic handling of entering and picking the winner(s) after a set amount of time.

name: help
shortDesc: View this help menu
detailedDesc: Open this help menu and descriptions.

name: holiday_avatar
shortDesc: Keep Stewbot's avatar seasonal
detailedDesc: This module sets Stewbot's profile picture to various presets on national holidays.
block_module_message: Discord requires bot avatars to be set globally, so I cannot block this module.

name: kick
shortDesc: Kick a user
detailedDesc: Removes the specified user from the server, the user will be able to rejoin if they find a new invite.

name: leaderboard
shortDesc: View a leaderboard
detailedDesc: View one of the leaderboards. See what server has globally counted the highest, how many people in this server have been on the emojiboard the most times, who has broken the filter rules the least, who has broken them the most (if you're an admin), or who's gotten the highest amount of server XP

name: levels_config
shortDesc: Configure level ups
detailedDesc: Configure a server leveling system where posting gets you an amount of experience points that allow you to level up. Exp points are granted with a cooldown to discourage spamming.

name: links
shortDesc: Get a list of links relevant for the bot
detailedDesc: This command provides a list of different links that you may find useful for learning more about the bot.

name: log_config
shortDesc: Configure log events
detailedDesc: Configure an amount of events you want Stewbot to automatically notify you of in a configurable channel for moderation and administration purposes.

name: move_message
shortDesc: Move a message from one channel into another
detailedDesc: This command will have Stewbot take a message and move it to a different channel. This command is accessed from the context menu, which on mobile is accessed by holding down on a message or on desktop by right clicking, and then pressing "Apps".

name: next_counting_number
shortDesc: View the next number to count at
detailedDesc: For the server counting game, if active, see the number that needs to be entered next, and if anybody is unable to take the next turn.

name: personal_config
shortDesc: Configure the bot for you personally
detailedDesc: Configure options for your personal interactions with the bot. This includes options such as if the bot tells you when you're filtered, if it automatically embeds certain links you post, or if you want it to not ping you whenb you level up in a server. You can also set your timezone for use with

name: ping
shortDesc: Check uptime stats
detailedDesc: The standard command to check if the bot is online, how long it's been online for, and in how many places it's installed.

name: poll
shortDesc: Make a poll with automatically tracked options
detailedDesc: Posts a poll with an automatically updated pie chart representing the response density.

name: prime_embed
shortDesc: Get a message ready to be embedded with /embed_message
detailedDesc: After using this command on a message, you can type PRIMED into  to have the bot embed it. This can be used for DMs, or servers the bot doesn't share with you if you install it to use anywhere. (Press the bot's PFP, then select "Add App", and then "Use it Everywhere"). This is a context menu command, which can be accessed by holding down on a message on mobile, or right clicking on desktop, and then selecting "Apps".

name: random rng
shortDesc: Generate a random number
detailedDesc: Generate a random number between boundaries you can choose.

name: random coin-flip
shortDesc: Flip a number of coins
detailedDesc: Flip up to ten coins and view the results

name: random 8-ball
shortDesc: Ask a question and receive an entirely random response
detailedDesc: Enter a question and let the "magic" of preprogrammed responses selected by a random number generator give you a completely random answer

name: random dice-roll
shortDesc: Roll a number of dice
detailedDesc: Roll up to ten dice and view the results

name: rank
shortDesc: View someone's rank for this server's level ups
detailedDesc: Check someone's rank for this server's level ups if this server has them configured.

name: remove_emojiboard
shortDesc: Remove an emojiboard
detailedDesc: Choose an emojiboard that you would no longer like to have Stewbot manage and post for.

name: report_problem
shortDesc: Report an error with the bot to be reviewed
detailedDesc: If some kind of issue appears with the bot of any kind and in any form, plesase run this command to report it to developers.

name: rss follow
shortDesc: Follow an RSS feed
detailedDesc: Specify a channel and an RSS feed, and every day at noon UTC, Stewbot will post any updated from that feed into the channel.

name: rss unfollow
shortDesc: Unfollow an RSS feed
detailedDesc: Specify the channel the feed is followed in, and the URL of the feed to unfollow, and Stewbot will no longer post RSS updates for that feed there. You can use  to get the URL needed for this command.

name: rss check
shortDesc: Check the RSS feeds a channel follows
detailedDesc: Run this command to check which RSS URLs Stewbot is posting from in the specified channel.

name: sentiment
shortDesc: React when Stewbot is mentioned
detailedDesc: Runs basic sentiment-analysis on messages mentioning Stewbot to determine how to react.

name: set_persistent_message
shortDesc: Set a message that will ALWAYS be visible as the latest message posted in this channel
detailedDesc: Configure a persistent message that will, in the server's name, always be persistently posted on the bottom of this channel.

name: slowmode
shortDesc: Set a slowmode for this channel, temporarily if desired
detailedDesc: Configure or remove a slowmode on the channel this command is used in, if you set hours or minutes until reverted, Stewbot will automatically repeal the slowmode change after the time is up.

name: sticky-roles
shortDesc: Add roles back to a user who left and rejoined
detailedDesc: If a user leaves the server and then comes back and this setting is enabled, Stewbot will automatically reapply the roles the user had beforehand. This is useful for roles that limit or enhance the user's permissions.

name: submit_meme
shortDesc: Submit a meme to the Stewbot moderators for verification to show up in `/fun meme`
detailedDesc: Using this command on a message with an image or video will submit it to the Stewbot moderators to verify to begin showing up in the  command. This is a context menu command, and is accessed by holding down on a message on mobile, or right clicking on desktop, and then selecting "Apps".

name: temp_role
shortDesc: Temporarily add or remove a role from someone
detailedDesc: Specify a role to add or remove temporarily from a specified user, and how long you want it to be added or removed for. At the end of the timer, the role changes will be automatically reverted.

name: ticket
shortDesc: Set up a ticket system here for users to contact mods
detailedDesc: Use this command in the channel you would like Stewbot to post the ticket message in. This message will contain a button that will connect the user's DMs with Stewbot to a thread in the channel specified during command setup.

name: timeout
shortDesc: Timeout a user
detailedDesc: Timeout a specified user for a configurable amount of time

name: timer
shortDesc: Set a timer/reminder
detailedDesc: Set a timer that will notify you after the specified amount of time in a configurable location.

name: timestamp
shortDesc: Generate a timestamp for use in your message
detailedDesc:
Generates a timestamp string. Pasting the output will automatically correct the time set to show the correct time for any user regardless of timezone.

				For example, if there was a timestamp for 4 EST, a user in PST would see 1.

name: translate
shortDesc: Translate a string of text
detailedDesc: Attempt to translate a string of text from one language into another. If nothing is entered for the language the text is already in, it will attempt to autodetect. If nothing is entered for the language it's going to, it will be in english.

name: translate_message
shortDesc: Attempt to autodetect the language of the message and translate it
detailedDesc: Tries to autodetect the language of a message, and translate it into English. This is a context menu command, accessed by holding down on a message on mobile or right clicking on desktop, and pressing "Apps".

name: user
shortDesc: Display a user's profile
detailedDesc: Choose a user and expand their profile information into the embed. If specified, you can also enlarge the profile picture which makes it easier to save which can be useful for various purposes.

name: view_filter
shortDesc: View the list of blacklisted words for this server
detailedDesc: Using this command will add a button that allows those who press it to view a spoilered list of all words this server has configured to block. This command, due to the nature of it, can have some very colorful language contained within the DM after pressing the button.

name: warn
shortDesc: Warn a user for bad behaviour
detailedDesc: Moderators can use this command to send a user a warning for doing something wrong anonymously in the server's name, with a severity scale from 1 to 10. You can then use  to check a list of all warnings dealt.

name: warnings
shortDesc: See the warnings that have been dealt in the server
detailedDesc: Moderators can use this command to view a list of warnings dealt, specifying a user will show only the warnings affecting that user, and not specifying a user will list users that have received warnings and a sum of the severities.

name: wotd
shortDesc: Play a word of the game reminiscent of Wordle
detailedDesc: Play a game reminiscent of Wordle but with our own word of the day and from within Discord. A new word is chosen every day at 12 UTC.
